01 Aug 2014

"Swift In Flux" by Jan Klausa: Also available at GitHub.

I would like to once again thank all for coming to our first Swift Warsaw event! It was really great to meet such a big crowd of Swifters or to-be-Swifters :) Hope our community will grow even further and see you at our next meet up! üí¨üëçüç∫
